column1: The Pit Room////I tried this place late on a Sunday afternoon so they were out of brisket
column2: which I really wanted to try. I opted for the chopped beef and a couple of types of sausage
column3: along with potato salad and beans. If you like very spicy meat
column5: but it wasn't so much to my taste. The sides were well made and overall the preparation was good. Just not a fan of BBQ this spicy. I may go back and try the ribs for a second sampling. As mentioned previously
column6: it's a little bit pricier than other BBQ joints.
